execWhitePaper.title: Executive White Paper: xeokit SDK for 3D BIM and AEC Visualization
execWhitePaper.description: This white paper outlines how xeokit addresses critical challenges in BIM data visualization, enhances workflow efficiency, and supports scalable, web-based deployments.

ifc2gltf.title: Importing an IFC Model into xeokit via glTF
ifc2gltf.description: How to convert an IFC model to glTF and then view in a xeokit web Viewer.

ifc2gltf2xgf.title: Importing an IFC Model into xeokit via XGF
ifc2gltf2xgf.description:
How to convert an IFC model to XGF format and then view it in a xeokit web Viewer.

Compared to glTF, XGF offers faster loading speed for some AEC models.

xeokitOverview.title: xeokit SDK Modules
xeokitOverview.description: An overview of the modules within the xeokit SDK, including scene and data representation, web viewer, model import, export and conversion tools, and various utility libraries.
